title: Bridges
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and David Hughes
brief_description: A simply stated stimulus film on bridges. Shows children making bridges, asking questions and talking about bridges. Shots of historic bridges and bridges of Melbourne are interspersed throughout. Suitable for primary years prep-6.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and David Hughes
